description.en: E-sports chain is a decentralized solution based on e-gaming + entertainment live industry, mainly for all competitive events, live platform, gaming network, gaming stars, gaming reality show, all gaming players, cross Habitat cooperation and other common to create an ecosystem. At its heart is a set of de-centralized account and forecasting systems based on blockchain technology, using e-coins (EPC) as settlement tokens to create a digital token that circulates across projects to connect all levels The user relationship between the formation of a new type of blockchain ecology.
